snippet.title: RPG Maker 2003 Promotional Video
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/362870/

For the first time ever, RPG Maker 2003 is officially available in English! This legendary game development engine is both highly affordable and easy to use, and it remains one of the most popular RPG Maker installments to date.

•Create battles in the style of classic RPG’s with the built in and customizable side view battle system
•Enjoy an assembly of retro graphics, music, and sound effects that have been upgraded from RPG Maker 2000 
•Share your art assets and music between the different versions of RPG Maker, with the help of Game Character hub 
•Set your creativity free with an easy-to-use and powerful event system
•Make your dream retro game
•No programming required
•Bring your own characters to life
•Tell an immersive story
•Make your own skills and items
•Design your own side view RPG battles
•Import your own art and music

Trailer music created by Joel Steudler
